hours_text:
# Plan Your Visit

Discover the ocean’s underwater world and California’s fascinating maritime history through fun, interactive tours and activities that indulge your curiosity.

##### 

##### 

##### About: 

##### The Ocean Institute, founded in 1977, is a community-based 501(c)(3) organization that educates 100,000 children, teachers, parents, and visitors annually through over 30 marine science and maritime history programs. We are located on 2.4 acres in the Dana Point Harbor; adjacent to a Marine Protected Area. The facility is an ocean education center that offers in-depth Marine Science and Maritime History programs.

[Calendar ](https://oceaninstitute.org/calendar-new/)

Location & Parking

[Memberships](https://oceaninstitute.org/membership/)

# **GENERAL ADMISSION**

# Saturday – Sunday 

# 10:00am – 3:00pm

Ocean Institute staff and volunteers stand ready to guide visitors through a wide range of experiences. Explore marine mammal artifacts, interactive exhibits rotating monthly, and local aquaria. Interact with a shark and ray touch tank and an intertidal touch tank. Bring history to life with a Sailors Life Tour onboard the deck of Spirit of Dana Point.

Tickets must be purchased for all individuals (adults and children).

**Pricing**

Adult: $16.00

Senior (55+) and Military: $14.00

Child (19 months – 13 y.o): $12.00

Infant/Toddler (0-18 months): Free!

**Members receive free admission!**

[Tickets](https://tickets.oceaninstitute.org/mainstore?categoryId=1284...

#### CRUISES & Sails

Join us on the water! We offer Whale and Marine Life tours, sailing on the Spirit of Dana Point, and more!

Click here to learn more.

#### FIELD TRIPS

Labs for all ages in ocean science, cruises on our research vessel, living history, and overnight programs! 

Click here to learn more!

#### Weekend Admission

Discover the ocean with interactive tours and activities that indulge your curiosity. 

Click here to learn more!

Plan Your Experience

Welcome to **Ocean Institute**

All programs are designed to maximize immersion, spark curiosity, and inspire a deep commitment to learning.

#### Whale and Marine Life Excursions

Experience our exciting, educational cruises as you encounter fascinating species in their Pacific Ocean habitat. Get up-close-and-personal as you observe sea life from the deck of our _R/V Sea Explorer._
